summary: Recruiting, developing, and retaining a diverse and inclusive workforce is part of the 2019 National Intelligence Strategy . The Intelligence Community's workforce in FY2011-2019 had slight increases in the proportions of women (+.7%), racial or ethnic minorities (+3.3%), and persons with disabilities (+6.2%). But proportions of women and racial or ethnic minorities stayed below federal workforce benchmarks, and proportions of persons with disabilities didn't meet...
title: Intelligence Community: Additional Actions Needed to Strengthen Workforce Diversity Planning and Oversight
